data.title: Science Fiction
data.meta_description: Asimov Is - Free download as Text File (.txt), PDF File (.pdf) or read online for free. Isaac Asimov wrote over 71 science fiction titles including his famous Foundation series and Robot series. While some authors wrote more books, Asimov's works were often compiled into omnibuses and collections, so his material could be obtained through around 37 different purchases. He also wrote extensively in other genres like non-fiction and edited many anthologies. The document provides a lengthy list of Asimov's science fiction works organized by series and individually, demonstrating his significant body of work in the genre.
